display.title: Mattermost
display.description:
High Trust Messaging for the Enterprise

Mattermost is a flexible, open source messaging platform that meets even the most demanding privacy and security standards

start.content:
#!/bin/sh
PID_FILE=/home/engines/run/mattermost.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh

cd /home/app/
bin/mattermost -c /home/app/config/config.json server&
echo -n $!" " > $PID_FILE
startup_complete


sleep 3600 &
echo $! >> $PID_FILE
wait
shutdown_complete
